Addon.name: Forum Settings
Addon.FormXML: <Form> <Description>Settings that affect the Forum Addon</Description> <HelpLink>http://www.contensive.com/Forum-Addon</HelpLink> <Tab name="Forums" heading="Forums" description=""> <SiteProperty caption="Segregate Private Forums" name="Forums - Segregate Private Forums" ReadOnly="0" Type="boolean" Selector="" Description="When checked, forums will be divided into two lists, Public Forums and Private Forums.">0</SiteProperty> <SiteProperty caption="Allow Profile" name="Forums - Allow Profile" ReadOnly="0" Type="boolean" Selector="" Description="When checked, authenticated users will see an update profile button. They can manage their identity and signup for forum update emails.">1</SiteProperty> <SiteProperty caption="Profile Block Update Group" name="Forums - Profile Block Update Group" ReadOnly="0" Type="integer" Selector="[None:0|listid(Groups)]" Description="When Allow Profile is checked, people in this group can not update their profile.">0</SiteProperty> <SiteProperty caption="Allow Notifications" name="Forums - Allow Notifications" ReadOnly="0" Type="boolean" Selector="" Description="When checked, the profile form will include a section for Forum Notifications. Forum Notifications allow users to be notified of new posts or comments to select forums.">1</SiteProperty> </Tab> </Form>

Field.Name: Name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The name of the forum. This is used in the backend to identify the forum, and is also used on the public site if the Headline is blank.

Field.Name: Headline
Field.Caption: Headline
Field.HelpDefault: The public headline for the forum. If blank, the forum name is used.

Field.Name: EmailMessageParent
Field.Caption: Email Replies to Parent Post Authors

Field.Name: overview
Field.Caption: Overview
Field.HelpDefault: A short description of the forum. It is displayed in the list of forums, and is used on the forum thread list if the description is blank

Field.Name: imageFilename
Field.Caption: Icon
Field.HelpDefault: The 80px x 80px image used in the forum list. If blank a default image is used.

Field.Name: block
Field.Caption: Enable Blocking
Field.HelpDefault: When enabled, only people in the following groups have access to the forum.
